title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI/Docker command and an OpenAI-compatible REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same features as Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, retrieval.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured, open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; no API keys needed.

title: ollama-cli (sugarforever/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive REPL wrapper around Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, markdown.

title: ollama-copilot (cmiller01/ollama-copilot)
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-compose (direktoren/ollama-compose)
summary: Docker-Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Postgres vector DB, and RAG ingestion.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama-index to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, POJO mapping, Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-ex (elixircnx/ollama-ex)
summary: Elixir client with GenServer behaviour for streaming chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-rs (pepperoni21/ollama-rs)
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET 8 client with dependency-injection helpers and Blazor sample chat app.

title: ollama-discord (drogue-iot/ollama-discord)
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers via Ollama models; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-slack (technovangelist/ollama-slack)
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local LLM power to channels with mentions or shortcuts.

title: ollama-gui (oskarkook/ollama-gui)
summary: Minimal Tauri-based cross-platform desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-nix (ollama-nix/ollama-nix)
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible Ollama builds and dev shells with CUDA acceleration.

title: ollama-terraform (cloudposse/terraform-ollama-aws)
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled EC2 autoscaled Ollama cluster on AWS.

title: ollama-hackernews (Hacker News discussion)
summary: Community thread comparing Ollama to llama.cpp, text-generation-webui, and local GPT alternatives.
